pageProps.title: An Inside Look into Investment Banking: Pay, Hours, and Opportunities
pageProps.metaDesc: Investment banking is one of the most prestigious and highly sought-after career paths in the world of finance. The job is known for its high pay, long hours, and intense workload. For those looking to enter this field, it can be challenging to navigate the complex and often mysterious world of investment banking. In this article, we’ll take a closer look at some of the most common questions people have about investment banking, from pay and hours to exit opportunities.
